content: Does anyone know if there are possible values for jurisdiction that isn't covered by the code system urn:iso:std:iso:3166:-2?
but there's also regions as well, which are allowed

Speaking of 3166:-2, the language of the display names seem all over the place. I see that ISO says they are the name preferred by the jurisdiction, but I doubt anyone in the province of Prince Edward Island, Canada would agree that Île-du-Prince-Édouard is the commonly preferred name in this English-speaking part of the country.
